ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch effects (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: We had a similar problem in Frontier Mountains about a week ago.  there were 40 people in the zone or so for a couple hours and suddenly there were 3 and I
ygData.messageBody:
We had a similar problem in Frontier Mountains about a week ago. there were
40 people in the zone or so for a couple hours and suddenly there were 3 and
I could see them all. We had two fulls and a partial group in front of the
giant castle and all but 3 of us went LD. No one else in the zone was
spared. Luckily the three of us could handle the two giants the groups had
been fighting, but I hear about 20 people zone-wide died from that incident
whatever caused it. Its very eerie to be staring at 12+ LD people at once
getting beat on by giants.

Kit

I had a serious problem with this the other night in the Overthere zone. It
was around midnight Hawaii time and my group (4 others) were fighting
entire bub of EXP due to lag. To say the least I was quite pissed off.

At the time of the disconnect there were only around 10 people in the zone
and around 600 people on the server. Thats not enough people to cause
normal lag so the only explanation I think is valid is there was either a
server problem or a router problem.

Galtin of E'ci
